item.title: Fortnite Coming Back to iPhone in Australia After Epic's Legal Victory
item.description: Epic Games has announced that Fortnite will return to iOS in Australia after Apple and Google were found to have broken competition law by banning ‌Epic Games‌ from their app stores. Federal
